name: Goodnight Lola
description:
Life for Lola was plain and ordinary, til the that one fateful night she wandered into the abandoned mansion; the ancient spirits that resided there taking control of her and imbuing her with their spectral powers in return for control of her mortality. 

Submission to GMTK Game Jam 2020, Theme: Out of Control

How To Play:

WASD: Movement, Space: Jump, Left Mouse Click: Attack

Credits: 

Melina Rudianto - Menu Art, Concept Art, Pixel Art     https://www.melinarudianto.com/

Simon Smith - Gameplay Programmer, Game Design

Darren Kwan - Level Design, Game Design

EJ Lee - Animations, Pixel Art, Game Design
